title: Torrent Power seeks 10-year LNG supply from 2027
description: The utility is seeking delivery of six cargoes per year from 2027. The tender closes on August 16.Torrent Power seeks 10-year LNG supply from 2027
content: India's Torrent Power has issued a tender seeking supplies of liquefied natural gas (LNG) over a period of 10 years, two industry sources said on Monday. The utility is seeking delivery of six cargoes per year from 2027. The tender closes on August 16.
